Package org.ldaptive.schema

Interface SchemaElement<T>

Type Parameters:
T - type of element identifier key
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractNamedSchemaElement, AbstractSchemaElement, AttributeType, DITContentRule, DITStructureRule, MatchingRule, MatchingRuleUse, NameForm, ObjectClass, Syntax
public interface SchemaElement<T>
Interface for schema elements.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    String
    format()
    Returns this schema element as formatted string per RFC 4512.
    T
    getElementKey()
    Returns the key for this element.

  • Method Details

    • getElementKey

      T getElementKey()
      Returns the key for this element. Typically, an OID but may also be an integer.
      Returns:
      element key

    • format

      String format()
      Returns this schema element as formatted string per RFC 4512.
      Returns:
      formatted string
